title: CU & NYU Mixer
desc:
Come join CU & NYU buildOn for the first ever CU & NYU Mixer! The festive night will include a live DJ, food, dancing, raffles, date auctions and mingling with other NYU and CU students.? 
 Tickets are required for entry and cost $5 
 All of the proceeds will go to buildOn at NYU and Columbia University buildOn.
